tournaments.format: 36-hole stroke play qualifying (Mon Jul 20–Tue Jul 21), then match play to 36-hole final (Wed Jul 22–Sat Jul 25). 64 qualify for match play.

Schedule: Mon Jul 20–Tue Jul 21 stroke play, Wed Jul 22 R64, Thu Jul 23 R32/R16, Fri Jul 24 QF/SF, Sat Jul 25 36-hole final.

tournaments.name: Western Amateur Qualifier

signup.notes: After championship field finalized Fri Jun 26, non-exempt players get email link to register. First-come first-served. 84 players, 7 qualifying spots. Entry fee $175.

tournaments.notes: ⚠️ CHANGED: Qualifier is Sun Jul 26 at Flossmoor Golf Club, Flossmoor IL (not Winnetka, not Mon Jul 27). 18-hole stroke play. 84 players, 7 spots awarded. Starting times 7am-9:10am off #1 & #10. Pairings posted Fri Jul 24. Register by Sun Jul 19. Western Am is Mon Jul 27–Sat Aug 1 at Beverly CC, Chicago IL.
